6ced3998-32ad-4397-86c5-dbf47a5a90eb.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Tax Preparer Assistant Certificate have demonstrated the ability to prepare tax returns for individuals and sole proprietorships. Earners are able to interpret figures and what they mean to an individual or company. Earners have experience using commercially available tax software. Certificate earners can obtain employment as a tax preparer or tax associate.

f92fbbbe-51f4-42b8-8760-705574d4362e.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Payroll Assistant Certificate have demonstrated the ability to compile and record employee time and payroll data. Earners are able to compute and post wages, calculate deductions and prepare paychecks. They are able to prepare required quarterly and annual federal payroll forms. Earners will be able to utilize Excel. Certificate earners can obtain employment as a payroll clerk, payroll assistant, payroll specialist, or personnel assistant.

88f71ee5-1397-4bde-bb98-212d371cc349.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Business Services Manager Technical Diploma have demonstrated knowledge in the major functional areas of business including law, accounting, information technology, and marketing. e9f3589e-d9cb-4cd2-8885-b5de839a5073.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Accounting Assistant Technical Diploma are able to compute, classify, and record numerical data to keep financial records for a small company. Students completing this program will have the option to continue into the parent program or become employed directly in the field. Graduates will have opportunities reaching across all industries.

e5ed61c6-9880-4f60-aff2-b654c391865e.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College IT-Web programing tech diploma have demonstrated web design principals, standards and best practices in designing effective and usable websites. They will be able to use SQL commands to query a database, display data on a webpage and be able to test troubleshooting a webpage.

Earners are also practice in project management including budgeting, sequencing, and lead, lag and time dependent process.
0489468b-dddf-4c1c-869c-1b8fa6cee80c.name: Technical Supervisor Certificate

4c90238d-5c2a-4071-8abe-0cc2851ff0c6.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Small Business Entrepreneurship Technical Diploma learn how to plan, develop and manage current or prospective small businesses. badge_template_activities.title: Graduates of the Small Business Entrepreneurship program complete 33 academic credits.  They will evaluate a business concept, determine its feasibility and develop a comprehensive business plan for the concept. The learner will evaluate and create marketing strategies focused on social media, mobile and traditional marketing efforts, and become knowledgeable with the accounting records used with small businesses.

d5c42307-da62-41d2-acc0-e188e1bdcc09.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Project Management certificate have demonstrated the skills needed to be a successful project manager. 34fe1ccc-6a48-48b2-ba46-08ea80eba246.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Computerized Accounting Using QuickBooks certificate have demonstrated ability to set up a business and record customer, vendor, inventory, banking, credit card, general ledger and payroll transactions. This certificate prepares the Learner for the Intuit QuickBooks Certified User exams.

With this certificate and a degree, they can obtain entry-level employment as proposal writers.

badge_template_activities.title: The Computer Applications certificate requires students to complete 12 academic credits. The certificate allows students to choose from the following: operating systems, word processing, spreadsheets, presentation graphics, publishing, and database.

8798017b-cb4e-4177-b6ae-6f21af2db7fd.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Technical Journalist Certificate demonstrated research, writing, layout, and editing skills. They can gather facts using primary and secondary sources. They can create accurate and objective stories for blogs, newsletters, social media, and more. They have experience using writing applications, layout applications, content management systems, and social media. They can obtain employment as entry-level content writers, journalists, or staff writers.
8798017b-cb4e-4177-b6ae-6f21af2db7fd.name: Technical Journalist Certificate

alignments.name: Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs

alignments.description: Gateway Technical College is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC)

badge_template_activities.title: The Technical Journalist Certificate requires students to complete 15 academic credits. The topics covered in those courses include editing skills, layout and design skills, research fundamentals, journalism, and social media.

3b6966cd-aecf-4db7-a80b-c250afb1cb23.description: This certificate provides principles, theory, and hands-on activities as related to customer service. This is an online certificate and is open to any student at Gateway.
3b6966cd-aecf-4db7-a80b-c250afb1cb23.name: Customer Service Certificate

alignments.name: Higher Learning Commission
alignments.description: Gateway Technical College is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC).

alignments.description: Gateway Technical College's business programs are accredited by the Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP).

badge_template_activities.title: The Customer Service requires students to complete 7 academic credits. The topics covered in those courses include: customer service, communication, interpersonal skills and management.

3da14e87-711d-44d4-a6be-f25f15c09ede.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Copywriter Certificate have demonstrated research, planning, copywriting, and evaluation skills in print and digital environments. They can create various types of marketing pieces, such as ads, emails, scripts, landing pages, and social media posts. They can use authoring software, content management systems, and social media. With this certificate and a degree, they can obtain entry-level advertising and copywriting positions.
3da14e87-711d-44d4-a6be-f25f15c09ede.name: Copywriter Certificate

alignments.description: Gateway Technical College is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC).

badge_template_activities.title: The Copywriter Certificate requires students to complete 15 academic credits. The topics covered in those courses include research fundamentals, copywriting, journalism, social media writing, and web content development.

0af02f60-3c4f-4525-aa28-b9326a8446be.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Sustainability Accounting Certificate have demonstrated an appreciation for working to the benefit of their community, both locally and in the larger world-wide sense. They have examined the factors that lead to long-term sustainability of an organization. Earners know how to balance profit with the needs of their stakeholders. This certificate provides a sustainability focus to someone who has an accounting or business degree. (Available Summer 2017)
0af02f60-3c4f-4525-aa28-b9326a8446be.name: Sustainability Accounting Certificate

alignments.name: Higher Learning Commission
alignments.description: Gateway Technical College is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC).

alignments.description: Gateway Technical College's business programs are accredited by the Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs (ACBSP).

badge_template_activities.title: The Sustainability Accounting Certificate requires students to complete 10 academic credits.  The topics covered in those courses include triple bottom line accounting, accounting principles following GAAP, as well as a service learning experience.  Follow link for more information.

7ac796d6-7d63-4275-aa5e-9577a22cd5d2.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Web Content Writer Certificate demonstrated online research, design, writing, and analytic skills. They can create graphics and text for blogs, social media, and websites. They can design content for a positive user experience, optimize pages for search engines, post to various social media sites, and use a content management system. With this certificate and a degree, they can obtain entry-level employment as social media or web content specialists.
7ac796d6-7d63-4275-aa5e-9577a22cd5d2.name: Web Content Writer Certificate

alignments.name: Accreditation Council for Business Schools and Programs

alignments.description: Gateway Technical College is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC).

badge_template_activities.title: The Web Content Writer Certificate requires students to complete 15 academic credits. The topics covered in those courses include research fundamentals, information architecture, the web content development process, social media writing, and website development.

1d433d20-c175-4446-8428-069e8e8cb814.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Editor Certificate demonstrated editing and project management skills. They can correct paper and digital documents using professional editorial practices. They have experience conducting proofs, copyedits, and comprehensive edits. They also can manage multiple projects, work collaboratively with content developers, and form relations with printers and other vendors. With this certificate and a degree, they can obtain entry-level employment as editors.
1d433d20-c175-4446-8428-069e8e8cb814.name: Editor Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The Editor Certificate requires students to complete 12 academic credits. The topics covered in those courses include editing skills, the editorial process, project management, and publishing techniques.

6517255d-1936-45df-95a7-db19e29355ea.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) Security Certificate will have the skills needed to obtain the CCNA Security certification from Cisco Systems.
6517255d-1936-45df-95a7-db19e29355ea.name: Gateway Technical College - CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate) Security

badge_template_activities.title: The CCNA Security Certificate requires students to complete 10 academic credits. The topics included are network infrastructure to maintain the integrity, confidentiality and availability of the network data and devices.

0345e1b4-98ca-40d0-aae7-8224652a55f4.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Professional Communications Specialization Certificate demonstrated the basic research, planning, writing, design, and publishing skills needed by professional writers. They can create a range of print and digital information products. They can use professional authoring software, manage information projects, and evaluate the quality of information products. Certificate earners can obtain entry-level communications positions.
0345e1b4-98ca-40d0-aae7-8224652a55f4.name: Professional Commmunications Specialization Certificate

b283e911-d9d7-40eb-b8ff-471521167779.description: Earners of the Gateway Technical College Public Relations Specialist Certificate demonstrated research, writing, editing, and technology skills needed to develop public relations communications. Students have practiced the steps to research, plan, create, promote, and evaluate strategic communications that build relationships between organizations and their public. They have identified positive and negative situations faced by organizations, applied communication strategies, and reviewed media
b283e911-d9d7-40eb-b8ff-471521167779.name: Public Relations Specialist Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The Public Relations Specialist Certificate requires students to complete 18 academic credits. The topics covered in those courses include research fundamentals, PR strategies, PR communications for media outlets, social media communications, and editing.
